title: Bobby Gives Everyone One Question About His New Girlfriend + Amy Gives Great Adopting Advice + Name That Viral Video
itunes:title: Bobby Gives Everyone One Question About His New Girlfriend + Amy Gives Great Adopting Advice + Name That Viral Video
description:
As promised, Bobby lets everyone on the show ask one question about his new girlfriend. Questions range from "will they ever live in the same city?" to "what made him like her?". A listener just adopted a boy and girl and is having trouble connecting with the girl. Amy gives her advice based on her own experiences with her adopted daughter. Plus, we play 'Name That Viral Video' where show members have to identify what funny thing a woman is laughing at in the clip!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
